articles.author: James Thomson
articles.title: China's Macau gambling crackdown shows James Packer got one thing right - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: An extraordinary crackdown on Macau’s casino sector by the Chinese government shows the wisdom of James Packer’s exit from the Asian gambling hotspot.
articles.content: A nine-point guide to the consultation period released by Macau officials sent shockwaves through the sector, particularly the suggestion that government supervision of daily casino operations would … [+2234 chars]

articles.title: For holding farewell party at Orchard store with more than 50 staff, Apple fined $1000 - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Apple was fined $1,000 for holding a social workplace event at its Orchard Road store on June 18. "Staff had gathered at the event to celebrate an employee's final day at the establishment," the Singapore Tourism Board (STB) told The Straits Times…
articles.content:

articles.title: Historian Thum Ping Tjin given stern warning by police over five illegal election advertisements - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — The police have issued a stern warning in lieu of prosecution to historian Thum Ping Tjin and his company, Observatory Southeast Asia, for publishing five paid advertisements during the 2020 General Election (GE) illegally.

articles.title: Jamie Chua flaunts her Louis Vuitton collection and reveals why she doesn't put anything in half of them - AsiaOne
